channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Commons Email
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Commons Email

item.title: CVE-2017-9801|2024-09-16T19:05:37.866Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20commons%20email
item.description: When a call-site passes a subject for an email that contains line-breaks in Apache Commons Email 1.0 through 1.4, the caller can add arbitrary SMTP headers.
